title: Job Openings at Primly Premium Solutions Limited
content:
Primly Premium Solutions Limited is an indigenous company specialised in Information Technology using high level technology to identify gaps in systems and create innovative solutions to bridge those gaps. We offer other services and products such as Healthcare, Telecom, Manufacturing, and Business consulting.

At Primly Premium Solutions, we are passionate in the pursuit of excellence and financial success with uncompromising services and integrity which is why we are in the industry to make a positive mark.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) IT Assistant

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Summary
     

            
    




	PPS is seeking a trainable IT Assistant to provide administrative and first-level technical support to team members.


Job Description
Office Assistance:


	Assist team members with organizing files, scanning documents, making photocopies, and scheduling meetings.
	Process orders for equipment, including sourcing vendors, obtaining invoices, and processing requests.
	Collect and receive orders from vendors, distribute orders to various centers, and run other errands as needed.
	Perform clerical and administrative tasks to support the IT Team.
	Record information in databases and generate reports and documents.
	Assist with the configuration and connection of peripheral equipment (e.g., printers, monitors, scanners) to computer systems.
	Provide basic equipment support across centers, including setup, troubleshooting, and cleaning of hardware.
	Perform routine checks on CCTV systems, attendance scanners, walkie-talkies, and other IT gadgets to ensure proper functionality.
	Run daily website downtime tests and generate monthly reports to track performance.


Basic IT Support & Troubleshooting:


	Assist in the installation and configuration of Windows operating systems and software applications, ensuring systems are up-to-date.
	Troubleshoot and resolve basic hardware and software issues, escalating to senior IT staff when necessary.


Application Testing:


	Test and retest multiple web and mobile applications.
	Identify bugs, software defects, and inconsistencies.
	Record bugs, glitches, and other flaws identified during testing.
	Create and regularly update logs to document testing phases and defects.


Other:


	Record and log all interactions (queries, incidents, and resolutions) in relevant logs.
	Create and maintain reports using Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel, analyzing data and tracking IT-related performance metrics.
	Maintain a database of all equipment (Computers, Keyboards, Wireless Adapters, Routers, etc.).
	Performs miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Diploma or equivalent in a relevant field.
	IT certifications (e.g., CompTIA, Microsoft) are an advantage.
	Experience with CCTV installation and maintenance.
	Ability to perform basic laptop repairs (e.g., replacing hard drives, system setup).
	Proficient in Microsoft Excel, including the use of formulas.
	Ability to deliver basic training to staff.
	Familiar with office equipment like printers, scanners, and copiers.
	Minimum typing speed of 45 words per minute.
	Strong communication skills (verbal and written).
	Ability to handle confidential information.
	Physically able to lift equipment and work in various postures.
	Can manage high-pressure situations and pay attention to detail.


Application Closing Date: 1st November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CVs (PDF Format) to: jobs@primlypremiumsolutions.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Feel free to include relevant certifications.

 

 

2.) IT Operations & Web Specialist

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a versatile IT professional with strong web development experience who is also comfortable with systems administration, user support, and managing IT infrastructure across multiple organisations.
	You’ll work closely with the IT Lead to support operations across multiple hospitals and business units within our group. If you enjoy working across development, IT operations, and projects that have real-world impact, we’d love to hear from you.


Key Responsibilities
Web Development & Product Support:


	Build, maintain, and update internal and external websites using Laravel, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
	Work closely with external developers on new product rollouts and updates
	Monitor the uptime and performance of all websites using monitoring tools
	Support in app and web project testing, including bug logging, feedback collection, and user experience improvement
	Maintain project trackers, SOPs, and documentation
	Serve as a liaison between IT, management, vendors, and end users
	Track KPIs such as system uptime, resolution times, and adoption rates


ERP & System Deployment:


	Lead or support the deployment of ERP systems to client organisations
	Handle data migration, user setup, and system configuration
	Plan and oversee multiple training sessions for staff across departments
	Work directly with end-user departments to ensure full adoption and ongoing support
	Maintain a centralized knowledge base (FAQs, guides, walkthroughs)


Cloud & Server Management:


	Manage AWS EC2 servers and cloud infrastructure; monitor performance and billing
	Oversee domain and DNS management, web hosting accounts, and server security
	Use cPanel and WHM to maintain hosting environments and handle deployment


IT Infrastructure & Technical Support:


	Provide hands-on and remote technical support to staff across multiple locations
	Set up and troubleshoot laptops, network devices, printers, and peripherals
	Manage and respond to tickets, escalating complex issues as needed
	Assist in maintaining basic cybersecurity protocols across devices and platforms
	Support phishing simulations, password policies, and user awareness training
	Document and monitor IT risks and coordinate with the IT Lead on response actions.


Qualifications
Required:


	BSc or HND in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or related field
	5 years of Web development experience in one or more of the following: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel, WordPress, React, or Vue
	Exposure to version control systems like Git
	Familiarity with APIs and basic database queries.


You might be a fit if:


	You're a developer who’s also comfortable with broader IT responsibilities
	You enjoy working on multiple systems, not just one product or tool
	You want to grow into a leadership or senior IT role, not stay purely in development
	You have experience supporting non-technical users and managing rollouts at scale
	You like variety, working cross-functionally, and solving real-world business problems.


Application Closing Date: 1st November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV (PDF Format) and a cover letter to: jobs@primlypremiumsolutions.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail. 

Note


	If you are passionate about technology, we encourage you to apply!
	Feel free to include relevant certifications.


 

 

3.) Senior IT Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 

Job Summary


	The ideal candidate will manage our websites, cloud services, and IT systems while providing hands-on technical support. This role requires a solid understanding of web technologies and cloud platforms like AWS and cPanel.
	Experience with hardware setup or repair, CCTV installation, and tools like 3CX is a strong advantage.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain websites using frameworks and tools such as Laravel, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
	Keep all websites running smoothly with minimal downtime; set up tools to monitor uptime and performance.
	Manage domain names, web hosting accounts, DNS settings, and use tools like cPanel and WHM.
	Monitor and maintain our AWS cloud servers (ensure they are funded, online, and running efficiently).
	Work with the SEO team to improve website search rankings and technical performance.
	Lead web and app projects, from idea stage to launch, including planning, setting milestones, testing, and working with external developers.
	Provide IT support to team members across multiple office locations (remotely or on-site).
	Help with troubleshooting software, hardware, and connectivity issues.
	Assist in managing overall IT infrastructure with the internal team.
	Support and coordinate other general IT tasks as needed across departments.
	Set up and troubleshoot email accounts (Outlook, Gmail), Google Drive, and other cloud-based applications used by the organisation.
	Support in resolving helpdesk requests, prioritising urgent issues, and escalating when necessary.
	Assist with CCTV system installation, maintenance, and repairs.
	Use and support communication tools like 3CX VoIP phone systems.
	Other duties as assigned


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
	Strong experience with Laravel, HTML, CSS, and general web development.
	Knowledge of cPanel, WHM, domain management, and web hosting.
	Experience managing AWS cloud infrastructure (especially EC2 instances).
	Hands-on experience with IT support – troubleshooting laptops, software, network issues, etc.
	Familiarity with CCTV setup and repair is an added advantage.
	Experience with 3CX or similar VoIP systems is a plus.
	Ability to communicate technical issues clearly to both technical and non-technical staff.
	Relevant IT certifications (Microsoft, CompTIA, AWS, Laravel, etc.) are a plus.


Application Closing Date: 30th September, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV (PDF Format) and a cover letter to: jobs@primlypremiumsolutions.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail. 

Note


	If you are passionate about technology, we encourage you to apply!
	Feel free to include relevant certifications.
